metadata.title: CVE-2011-4024 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in ocsinventory in OCS InventoryNG 2.0.1 and earlier allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web scriptor HTML via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2011-4024` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ocsinventory-reports - 2.0.5-1.1
ocsinventory-server - 2.0.5-1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ocsinventory-server package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.5-1.1').
